subject: p15192710
History: Evaluation of the patient with pneumothorax, resolved after chest tube placement. Follow up.
Findings: Portable AP radiograph of the chest was compared to prior study obtained the same day earlier as well as one day before. There is no interval reoccurrence of pneumothorax. Subcutaneous air is unchanged. The left lower lobe opacity is slightly smaller, consistent with decreasing hematoma most likely.
